Html:
Hello Radioman,

Great work ! The best Open source API i have ever worked with. My question is How can I select multiple markers from a map . In the demo , when I use Alt+Mouse Down/Up over a list of marker , I don't see how I can get a collection of the selected markers.

Thank you
SE
i would iterate markers and check if its in the area
Thank you for the reply . I know that SelectedArea event argument has Lat/Long , so should i iterate and see if the marker's lat/long falls within the selected area . Is that correct ?

It worked by iterating through the markers and check their lat/long to see if they fall withing the corneres of the selected area.

Thank you,
SE
